title: Gatos Silver Achieves Top-End Production in 2024
text:
Stay Ahead of the Market:

An update from Gatos Silver ( [(GATO)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/gato) ) is now available.
Gatos Silver reported strong production results for 2024, with silver production reaching the top end of its revised guidance and silver equivalent production slightly exceeding expectations. The company achieved record mill throughput, demonstrating significant operational improvements, and its performance positions it well for future ventures, including its combination with First Majestic.
More about Gatos Silver
Gatos Silver is a mining company primarily focused on silver production. It operates the Cerro Los Gatos mine in Mexico, which is 70% owned by the company, and is engaged in mining and milling operations as well as exploration programs.
YTD Price Performance: -1.19%
Average Trading Volume: 707,749
Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell
Current Market Cap: $1.04B
